text: "It's All Over Now, Baby Blue" is a 1965 song by Bob Dylan and is the last track from his fifth studio album Bringing It All Back Home. It went to be covered by Them for their second studio album Them Again and went to number 13 in Germany in early 1974. It was covered by The Byrds for their eighth studio album Ballad of Easy Rider and was released as an A-side to the single Jesus Is Just Alright. It went to number 97 in the United States. ==References== Category:1965 songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Bob Dylan songs Category:Joan Baez songs Category:Them (band) songs Category:The Byrds songs Category:Marianne Faithfull songs Category:Van Morrison songs Category:The Animals songs Category:Hole (band) songs
title: It's All Over Now, Baby Blue
